section.title: Introduction
section.p: IKVM.NET is an implementation of Java for Mono and the Microsoft .NET Framework. It includes the following components:

ul.li: A Java Virtual Machine implemented in .NET
A .NET implementation of the Java class libraries
Tools that enable Java and .NET interoperability

section.p: Read more about what you can do with IKVM.NET.

section.title: Related Work
section.p: The following projects are related to IKVM.NET in some way:

li.link: Mono: Open Source .NET implementation that includes IKVM.NET
MonoDevelop: A Mono IDE with IKVM Support
Tool to figure out jar dependencies and generate ikvmc script
jdk2ikvm: A source-level conversion tool to migrate Scala programs from JDK to .NET
